document_data.name: Arabellan Palace
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Arabellan Palace''' was the home of the ruler of [[Arabel]] in [[Cormyr]].
{{TOC limit|3}}
document_data.Description: The palace was luxurious to behold. It had five narrow towers, with elegantly sweeping turrets and conical roofs. The palace contained the court of [[Myrmeen Lhal]] and an assembly hall.
document_data.Location: The palace was located in the most prosperous section of the city, the north,{{Arabel map orientation}} being surrounded by the [[Citadel (Arabel)|citadel]] and multiple mansions of the rich elite and by the [[Lady's House]], a temple to [[Tymora]].
document_data.Defenses:
Soldiers of the [[Purple Dragons]] were stationed as palace guards. These were members of the city's garrison, which was under the command of Myrmeen Lhal.

Several floors of the palace were also warded by ''[[ring ward]]s''.
document_data.Services: Guests of the king were usually housed nearby in the [[Dragon's Rest (guesthouse)|Dragon's Rest]] instead of in the palace.
